name: Idle Shopping Mall Tycoon
description:
Welcome to your very own Shopping Mall! It’s your job to make it a complete success. Prove you’re a real tycoon of the Mall Industry and become super rich in a very short time.

You’ll have to start your mall from scratch. Design a great building that attracts customers and fill it with the fanciest stores. You’ll have to cover a huge variety of entertainment options, from shopping and fashion to food courts and movie theatres.

The more you offer, the more people will love your mall!!

Once you earn enough money, why not investing in a new center? You’ll be the role model of the shopping empires!!

Download the game now and let’s go to the mall!!

FEATURES
- Manage your own Shopping Mall!
- Upgrade your stores to attract more people
- Enjoy the game while you’re offline
- Daily Rewards
